title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Discourse-Based Job Analysis for Educational Technology and Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational technology theories, digital literacy, and science curriculum design experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Collect and analyze 50+ job advertisements in educational technology and instructional design to extract core competencies by field.
Systematically represent interrelationships between job roles by applying Stuart Hall’s Encoding/Decoding Model.
Write a job characteristics report for the science education field using qualitative analysis tools like NVivo.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
